Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip and faint traces of two lines of black-painted hieratic text, identifying the contents.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393130) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393130)
